name: Shaitan (Steppe lore)
shortLoreBlurb: Shaitan (Steppe lore) is a spirit from Steppe tied to desert wind, misfortune. Myths connect them with tempests and rulership.
overlapsLinks: Caishen (Chinese), Fortuna (Roman), Indra (Vedic), Lakshmi (Hindu), Perun (Slavic), Thor (Norse), Zeus (Greek)
description: Shaitan (Steppe lore) is a spirit from Steppe tied to desert wind, misfortune. Myths connect them with tempests and rulership.
